title: Jurisdiction of district courts; leased or rented personal property
context: ยง604-6.1 Jurisdiction of district courts; leased or rented personal property. Jurisdiction is conferred upon the district courts to try all cases resulting from the retention of leased or rented personal property, the value of which does not exceed $5,000. [L 1980, c 171, ยง3; am L 1981, c 176, ยง3]
